title: ACTREC Recruitment 2026 - Walk-in-Interview for Research Assistant Posts
description: The Advanced Centre for Treatment Research and Education in Cancer (ACTREC) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for Research Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the ACTREC Recruitment 2026 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can attend the walk-in at the address give...
